LanguageData.DMSE.Letter.HuntdownThreat.Label: Huntdown
LanguageData.DMSE.Alert.HuntdownThreat.Desc: military police of colonial fleet are searching the signal of missing Stele, it is only a matter of time they find you and send a hunting squad.
LanguageData.DMSE.Alert.HuntdownThreatCritical.Desc: the position of Stele has been tracked down, hunting squad and possible air strike will arrive in no time, transfer before it's too late.
